QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, odf_ui_views.id odf_pk, odf_ui_views.OWNER owner, odf_ui_views.IS_SYSTEM is_system, odf_ui_views.CODE code, odf_ui_views.VIEW_MODE view_mode, odf_ui_views.ASSOCIATED_OBJECT_TYPE assoc_obj_type, odf_ui_views.TYPE type, odf_ui_views.VIEW_TARGET_ID view_target_id, CREATED.FULL_NAME created_by, odf_ui_views.BLUEPRINT_ID blueprint_id, odf_ui_views.ASSOCIATED_INSTANCE_ID associated_id, odf_ui_views.NAME name, UPDATED.FULL_NAME updated_by, ODF_UI_VIEWS.CREATED_DATE created_date, ODF_UI_VIEWS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE last_updated_date from odf_ui_views odf_ui_views, srm_resources CREATED, srm_resources UPDATED where 1 = 1 and odf_ui_views.created_by = CREATED.user_id and odf_ui_views.last_updated_by = UPDATED.user_id
